title: Bug with Zed and Poppy.
body: I dashed to him as He Living Shadowed and dashed to his Shadow and it looks like his Shadow particle counted as terrain or something because he was a fair way away from the opposing wall and dashed to his shadow and was stunned. When it dragged him he didn't even come close to the wall so not sure if it was a bug on Poppy's side or Zeds.
